label: MainActivity
text: Received Looksies Requests Map View logout As long as you're there capture a venue for others to search and find! It's super easy! Add a venue Request a looxie from anywhere by selecting the area on the map! Drop pin Request a looxie from a specific venue by searching for it! Search venues Change your color on the map to indicate that you are super-eager to send looxies! Become eager! Check out the looxies you received from other reporters here! Your looxies Have people requested looxies from you? Respond to them here! Received requests MORE Total points You have 10 Bulletin likes (x2pt.) We give you 5 points for each Looxie like you receive and 1 point for every venue you enter! Number of venues you captured Your accomplishments and level! Are you or have you ever been a Featured Reporter? Your profile DO IT! NO THANKS Request a photo from all current Looxie users around the world! You only get to do it once! Initiate First Contact Finding... Finding... Finding... Finding... Tap to send a request! Active users' locations Unfolding map... ...or roll the dice! Drop a pin! 0 0 0 0 0 0 'Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum Lorem ipsum' What our users are shooting right now Around the world! Loading announcements! And enjoying it while doing it! Your location services are turned off. Consider turning them on for extra awesomeness and proper functionality Gr Se Vi optional message here! CANCEL SEND Looxie

text: you can enter details about your request here... PIN DROPPED Looksie SEND LOCAL REQUEST! By hiding your location from the map you will not be able to enjoy the full functionality of Looxie! You will receive less to no requests and you will not be able to level up and get new features. Not our idea of fun! Hide my location on the map Looxie
